name: World Eater (mishapozd)
description:
In World Eater, play as a retired, now-domicile soldier who lost his family and career due to an unfortunate event where he killed an innocent. You have to save the fate of Earth, but at what cost?

Enjoy!

Credits Artists Sebastian Misha Nick Programmers Melody Misha Level Design Sebastian Misha Nate Sound Design and Music Sebastian Misha Nate Voice Actors Nick Nate Narrative Work Sebastian
